name: Lip Butter Balm for Hydration & Shine
about: What it is:u00a0A silky vegan balm that hydrates and soothes dry lips in seconds...Skincare Concerns: Dryness and Dullness..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Natural moisturizers that soothe, relieve, and condition parched lips..- Vegan Waxes: Soften and boost shine all day with a smooth, never-greasy texture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This formula delivers soothing moisture to parched lips in seconds. Butter up on the go for a quick hit of moisture and shineu2014or apply at bedtime as a nourishing overnight mask...Clinical Results: In an independent clinical study, with 39 participants aged 20 - 55:.-92% showed a significant improvement in clinically measured* moisturization, immediately after application...in an independent consumer use study, with 39 participants aged 20 - 55, immediately after application:.-97% agreed their lips felt softer.-97% agreed their lips felt hydrated.-92% agreed their lips looked less flaky.-100% agreed their lips looked healthier..Flavor Descriptions:.u00b7 Vanilla - sheer clear.u00b7 Sweet Mint - sheer clear.u00b7 Vanilla Beige - sheer beige.u00b7 Brown Sugar - sheer nude.u00b7 Poppy - sheer citrus coral.u00b7 Pink Sugar - sheer light pink.u00b7 Cherry - sheer cherry red.u00b7 Iced Coffee - A hint of iced coffee flavor and a sheen of cocoa color.u00b7 Hot Cocoa - sheer warm chocolate...This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness...This product is an Allureu00a0Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients: -Shea and Murumuru Seed Butters: Natural moisturizers that soothe, relieve, and condition parched lips..-Vegan Waxes: Soften and boost shine all day with a smooth, never-greasy texture....Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Hydrogenated Poly (C6-14 Olefin), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Vanillin, Tocopherol, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Mica, BHT, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use when your lips need extra hydration throughout the dayu2014or as an overnight mask...Recycling Instructions:.-Upon unboxing, flatten the unit carton and liner and place in the recycling bin..-Once youu2019ve finished the balm, remove and discard the cap and then recycle the plastic tube.

reviews.review_text: Out of all of the Summer Friday lip balms, Brown Sugar is my absolute favorite! I love the smell of it as well as the applicator; it's so good that I don't even need to look into the mirror to apply it on my lips. However, I find that it doesn't last very long, which is such a shame because it has a great texture and feel! Since it doesn't last too long, that also means that I didn't notice any change in my lips. They weren't necessarily dryer, but they didn't feel deeply moisturized. If you are looking for a lip balm for deep moisture, I don't think this is it. But if you want a balm that leaves a sheer tint and an amazing glossy finish, then this is the perfect product for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this product for several friends and finally decided to buy one for myself. I like the variety of flavors and scents, the viscosity is thick but not sticky where hair clings to it, and it has the perfect amount of tint.  However, I still find it lacking when it comes to actually hydrating the lips. I can feel my lips becoming drier, and it feels like this product is just retaining the moisture that is already there, instead of hydrating my lips and leaving them better nourished or conditioned. For products in similar price ranges, I would much rather have the Eadem, Ole Henriksen, or Tatcha. All of those products leave my lips feeling plush and better than initial application. Even lower cost brands like Neutrogena have better balms when it comes to improving the texture and appearance of the lips over this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 'Birthday Cake' was my first (and favorite) offering from SF's various lip butter balms. Now that it's very difficult to get hold of, I've settled on what I believed to be the nearest match: Pink Sugar. The two share a similar vanilla/marshmallow fragrance and taste, with the biggest being that Birthday cake had a stunning iridescent shimmer to it, whereas Pink Sugar has none of that, instead it is pretty much clear, with just a hint of pink and (to me at least) tastes like icing! The scent is quite strong at first but dies down after a while. I do love the buttery texture which is neither too heavy/greasy, nor too light. My lips always feel well-conditioned during and after applying these, and never sticky. Having said that I still prefer Birthday Cake from the two and hope it's added to the permanent line up in the future. 'Cherry' - a sheer red which contains a lot more pigment than the aforementioned shades, is another firm favorite of mine.    ~ My Top 5 Beauty must-have list ~  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. reviews.review_title: Detailed review for decision making xoxo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: FLAVOR: If you want a flavor of this lip balm thatu2019s not a fruity one, definitely go with this one. The other vanillas and sugars have a weird underlying burnt plastic taste. The brown sugar however is YUMMY mhm, and the taste lasts too.  SMUDGING: As long as you let it set for a 20 minutes you can drink or eat and it wonu2019t completely smudge on the straw. It lasts so long too, literally all day without too much activity and i apply it maybe 2-3 times a day if im busy. COLOR: The color is stunningly versatile too. Itu2019s evenly pigmented and is subtle enough to look natural but bold enough to balance your face. SMOOTH: It is extremely smooth, itu2019s not buttery it is velvety mhmmm im in love. Only complaint is every time i put it on there is literally one grit. literally one single grit. its so weird but like pshhhhh whatever everythimg else is perfect MY OPINION: yas five stars i get the hype. Personally i would use this during the day and not as a nighttime moisturizer because it kinda crusts my lips overnight, im guessing cause its not getting reapplied. atm i have this and an olehenriksen lip balm which i use overnight. Iu2019d definitely check out the olehenriksen if you want  a longer lasting and less gritty lip balm, but for daytime i love summer fridays

reviews.review_text: I hate how much I love this lip balm. I got it as a treat to myself for braving the mall during the holidays and I had a gift card. Normally I wouldnu2019t have purchased such an expensive lip balm but the gift card made me feel like it was free. I tried it on and I was hooked. So much so that when I lost it at the movies I actually combed the theatre for it and called the m the next day to see if they found it after losing it only a few hours after getting it. I checked everywhere and eventually realized it wasnu2019t going to pop back up so I picked up a new one and paid out of pocket for it and I have to say it was worth it. I thought the tiktok girlies were lying but this stuff makes my lips feel so soft and I love the glossy look it gives itu2019s the perfect finishing touch to my makeup look. Plus itu2019s not super sticky or gloopy feeling just thick and nourishing with a touch of shine. iu2019m obsessed.
